title: Thaddeus Kosciuszko National Memorial: Bookstore
body: Bookstore       The Thaddeus Kosciuszko National Memorial sales center offers items that relate to the site. More items are available for purchase at the Independence Square Museum Store located inside Old City Hall at 5th and Chestnut Streets. The Independence Square Museum Store is operated by Eastern National, and is open 7 days a week from March through December. The Independence Square Museum Store offers a variety of souvenirs, such as miniature Liberty Bells, postcards, magnets, toys, Park Ranger-recommended books and films, and t-shirts. Many fine gift items are available as well. Proceeds from your purchases help support Independence National Historical Park. Eastern National is a non-profit organization which provides quality educational products and services to the visitors to America's national parks and other public trusts. Eastern National currently operates educational retail outlets in 30 states, from Maine to the Caribbean. Eastern National offers quality educational materials and services to park visitors and the general public at fair prices, and aids the National Park Service with the income derived from these activities. All of the products, programs and publications offered to visitors have a strong educational value and assist the educational programs of the National Park Service.
